trans-unit.source: Represents a control property that is data-bound to an expression.
When a page is parsed, the page parser retains information about an expression and the property it is bound to in a BoundPropertyEntry object.
Gets or sets the ID of the control that contains this binding.
A <xref:System.String> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the control that contains this binding.
Gets or sets the type of the control that is being bound to at run time.
The <xref:System.Type> of the control bound by the expression.
Gets or sets the value representing an expression during page parsing.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the expression.
Gets or sets the object used for evaluating the expression during page parsing.
An <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> for evaluating this expression.
Gets or sets the prefix for this expression.
A <xref:System.String> containing the prefix.
Gets or sets the name of the data field bound to by the expression.
A <xref:System.String> containing the data field name.
Gets or sets the format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
A <xref:System.String> containing the format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the expression was generated by the parser.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression was generated by the parser; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value of the control property is encoded.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the control property is encoded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the data retrieved from an expression builder object during page parsing.

An <xref:System.Object> containing the data retrieved from an <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> after it has called <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression*>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property contains a <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> accessor.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> accessor, which indicates that the property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadOnly" name="ReadOnly" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the expression is bound to a control that allows for inserting, updating, or deleting data.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression is bound to a control that allows for inserting, updating, or deleting data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether a control's <xref uid="langword_csharp_SetAttribute" name="SetAttribute" href=""></xref> method can be called.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SetAttribute" name="SetAttribute" href=""></xref> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
